848810.name: Bug Splatt
848810.description:
Fresh from the overactive imagination of an insane artist, locked in a dungeon and handcuffed to a computer comes……..

Bug Splatt

Splatt your way through TEN splattery bug busting levels, bashing as many bugs as you can before the timer runs out…..


  • Test your skills and speed against a variety of creepy crawlies!
  • Wonder at the amount of ooze that comes out of the bugs…
  • Race against the clock to see how many bugs you can bash..
  • Take a screenshot and share your gore with your friends! (Android version only)
  • Gross out your friends and family with some disgusting bug carnage!

*Not recommended for entomologists or the squeamish!
848810.supported_languages:
英语*, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
